children.description:
I apologize, but it seems that I don't have access to the historical open and close prices for Qualcomm's stock. However, I can provide you with a list of refreshing cocktails to enjoy by the beach and suggest sports activities that can be enjoyed on the beach.

Refreshing cocktails to enjoy by the beach:
1. Nutella and cognac coffee cocktail
2. Easy rhubarb cordial
3. Bottled chocolate orange negroni
4. Pickled bramble martini
5. Toasted marshmallow hot-buttered rum
6. Sangria

Sports activities that can be enjoyed on the beach:
- Beach volleyball
- Beach soccer
- Beach frisbee
- Stand-up paddleboarding
- Kayaking
- Snorkeling

Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.

function.name: iex_short_interest_list_for_investors_exchange_iex_trading
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "investors_exchange_iex_trading", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Consolidated market short interest positions in all IEX-listed securities"

function.name: sho_threshold_securities_list_for_investors_exchange_iex_trading
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "investors_exchange_iex_trading", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "IEX-listed securities that have an aggregate fail to deliver position for five consecutive settlement days at a registered clearing agency, totaling 10,000 shares or more and equal to at least 0.5% of the issuer’s total shares outstanding (i.e., “threshold"

function.name: ohlc_for_investors_exchange_iex_trading
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "investors_exchange_iex_trading", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns the official open and close for a give symbol."

symbol.description: Specify stock symbol or use "market" for market-wide information

function.name: list_of_cocktails_for_the_cocktail_db
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "the_cocktail_db", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint responds with a list of cocktails that includes their names and images, as well as their IDs, which must be provided in the "Detailed Cocktail Recipe by ID" endpoint to receive the detailed cocktail recipe."

function.name: detailed_cocktail_recipe_by_id_for_the_cocktail_db
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "the_cocktail_db", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get Cocktail by ID"

function.name: spellcheck_for_web_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "web_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Check spelling."

text.description: The text string to check for spelling errors.

function.name: newssearch_for_web_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "web_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get news articles relevant for a given query."

pagesize.description: The number of items per page. The maximum value is 50.

topublisheddate.description: The  published date and time for the newest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

safesearch.description: A filter used to filter results for adult content.

frompublisheddate.description: The  published date and time for the oldest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

function.name: autocomplete_for_web_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "web_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Suggest as-you-type completion."

function.name: v4_sports_sport_odds_for_live_sports_odds
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "live_sports_odds", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns list of live and upcoming games for a given sport, showing bookmaker odds for the specified region and markets. Set the `sport` to a `sport_key` from the /sports endpoint. Alternatively if `sport=upcoming`, it will return a list of the next 8 upcom"

sport.description: sport key for which to return games and odds

regions.description: Determines which bookmakers appear in the response. Can be a comma delimited list of regions. Each region will count as 1 request against the usage quota for each market. Most use cases will only need to specify one region. For a list of bookmakers by regi

markets.description: The odds market to return. Can be a comma delimited list of odds markets. Defaults to h2h (head to head / moneyline). Outrights only avaialable for select sports. Note each market counts as 1 request against the usage quota.

dateformat.description: Format of returned timestamps. Can be iso (ISO8601) or unix timestamp (seconds since epoch)

function.name: v4_sports_for_live_sports_odds
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "live_sports_odds", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns a list of available sports and tournaments. Use the `sports_key` in requests for /odds and /scores endpoints."

function.name: v4_sports_sport_scores_for_live_sports_odds
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "live_sports_odds", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns list of live and upcoming games for a given sport, and optionally recently completed games. Live and completed games will contain scores. **Currently in beta** and only available for selected sports. For more info, see the [list of available sports"

sport.description: sport key for which to return games and odds

daysfrom.description: The number of days in the past from which to return completed games. Valid values are integers from `1` to `3`. If this field is missing, only live and upcoming games are returned.

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: I'm planning a family vacation to a beach destination. Can you recommend some refreshing cocktails to enjoy by the beach? Also, provide me with the historical open and close prices for Qualcomm's stock. Furthermore, suggest some sports activities that can be enjoyed on the beach.
